30b3('bum): stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu stobs rnams nang stong pa nyid dang /
30b4('bum): phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha'
30b5('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad sdong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
30b6('bum): mi dmigs pa spong ba nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan
30b7('bum): lag rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
31a1('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
31a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
31a3('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu lam nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong
31a4('bum): ba nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
31a5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
31a6('bum): ngo bo nyid spong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po
31a7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba
31b1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo ba
31b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /
31b3('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thogs
31b4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med
31b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshad med pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyin/
31b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa sdang pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
31b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid spong pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
32a1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
32a2('bum): pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dung / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / bdus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
32a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
32a4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa brgyad nang stong
32a5('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /
32a6('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong
32a7('bum): pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mthar gyis
32b1('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po sto nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus bya/
32b2('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos
32b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo ba cing stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa di bcad sdong panyid kyi
32b4('bum): spyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa'i
32b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / bdus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las dadas pa stong panyid dang / thog sa dang tha ma med
32b6('bum): ba stong pa nyid dang / dor bsad pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
32b7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shAr dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / byi rdzob
33a1('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong /
33a2('bum): pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /
33a3('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// /
33a4('bum): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
33a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /
33a6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
33a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang /
33b1('bum): de dam pa stong panyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mthab las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang bra ma med du stong pa nyid dang / dor bamed paspyod pa
33b2('bum): dang rang bzhin spong pa'id dang / chos thams cad spong ba'id dang / rang gi mi tshan nyid spong ba'id dang / mi migs mthong ci dag dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo'adi stong pa nyid dang / dngos de ming bde bo nyid stong 'i
33b3('bum): phyir yod pa ma yin no// shwar dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu nang stong pa nyid dang / byi stong pa nyid dang / phyinang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam
33b4('bum): pastong bcing dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin
33b5('bum): stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
33b6('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs pa bzhi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa
33b7('bum): stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang
34a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
34a2('bum): dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang sdong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong
34a3('bum): pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa
34a4('bum): nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa
34a5('bum): nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang /
34a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha/
34a7('bum): ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po
34b1('bum): med pastong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// shAr dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad na thod pa'i
34b2('bum): dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang
34b3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang thas med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
34b4('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no//
34b5('bum): de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas/ sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing / 'di lta
34b6('bum): ste/ chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' la chags pas de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag sbyin pa'i pha
34b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
35a1('bum): mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen to// nang stong pa nyid la mngon
35a2('bum): par zhen to// phyi stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//
35a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon
35a4('bum): bar zhen to// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// chos thams cad
35a5('bum): stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to//
35a6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen to// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// yang dag par spong ba rnams la
35a7('bum): mngon par zhen to// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// dbang po rnams la mngon par can to// stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la mngon par
35b1('bum): zhen to// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa la mngon par zhen to// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen to// mad med pa rnams
35b2('bum): la mngon par zhen to// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// rnam par thar pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// mthar gyis granas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul
35b3('bum): mngon par rten to// stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par can no// mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon par yin to// ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon pa zhin
35b4('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen to// snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la mngon par zhen to// mi 'jigs pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// sa
35b5('bum): yang dag par rig pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la mngon par zhen to// de dag da ltar mngon par ldan pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams
35b6('bum): la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du shes mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed
35b7('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus mi na
36a1('bum): mi mthong ngo // yid mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // sgra mi shes mi mthong ngo // dri mi shes mi mthong ngo // ro mi shes mi mthong ngo // reg
36a2('bum): mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
36a3('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
36a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid
36a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
36a6('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
36a7('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // sa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // chu'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // me'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // rlung gi khams mi shes mi mthong ngo //
36b1('bum): nam ma'adi khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ma rig pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'du byed mi shes mi mthong ngo // rnam par shes pa mi shes mi
36b2('bum): mthong ngo // ming dang gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye mched drug mi shes mi mthong ngo // rag pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // tsher ba sgo shes mi mthong ngo // sreng pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
36b3('bum): len pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // srid pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // rga shi mi shes mi mthong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shas mi mthong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pa
36b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong
36b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi sdong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // stong pa nyid
36b6('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // don das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'dus ma byas
36b7('bum): stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi
37a1('bum): mthong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo //
37a2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi shes mi mthong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi
37a3('bum): shas mi mthong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // yang dag par spong ba bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // dbang po lnga mi
37a4('bum): shes mi mthong ngo // stobs lnga mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden
37a5('bum): ba rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // bsam gtan rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshad med pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo //
37a6('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad mi shes mi mthong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mi shes mi mthong ngo // stong panyid dang / mtshan sa med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi shes mi mthong ngo //
37a7('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi shes mi mthong ngo // snying rje chen po mi shes mi mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
37b1('bum): stobs bcu mi shes mi mthong ngo // mi 'jigs pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi mi shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi shes mi
37b2('bum): mthong ngo // de ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'dod pa ste/ de dag 'byung ba ma yin no// gang nas 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas 'byung ba
37b3('bum): ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas 'byung ngam yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// can thos kyis nis 'byung ba ma yin no// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa nas
37b4('bum): 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mi ches paste/ ji ltar yid mi ches she na/ gzugs gzigs kyis sdong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tsher rab tshor bas spong zhes bya bar yid mi
37b5('bum): chos so// 'du shes 'du shes kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi rgyas so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes
37b6('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so// mig mig gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna brna bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna smras sdong zhes bya bar yang mi chis so// lce lces/
37b7('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus lus kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid yid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// gzugs gzugs kyis song zhes bya bar
38a1('bum): yid mi ches so// sgra smras stong zhes bya byar yid mi ches s+ho// dri dris stong zhes bya bar yid mi rjes so// rdoros stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// reg
38a2('bum): reg gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos chos kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches
38a3('bum): so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i rnam par shes pa sna'i rnam par shes pas sdong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// lce'i/
38a4('bum): rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi rnam
38a5('bum): par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna
38a6('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa sna'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong zhes
38a7('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi
38b1('bum): ches so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas sdong zhes bya bar yid kyi ches so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor brna ba'i
38b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
38b3('bum): lce ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor rabs stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshur ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
38b4('bum): rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sa'i khams su'i
38b5('bum): khams kyis sdong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis sdong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mu'i khams ma'i khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rlung gi khams
38b6('bum): rlung gi khams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nam mkha' 'ams nam mkha'i khams kyis spong zhes bya bar yid michis so// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i 'ams kyis stong zhes/
38b7('bum): bya bar yid mi ches so// ma rig pa ma rig pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'du byed 'du byed kyis stong zhes bya bar yid michis so// rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong zhes bya bar/
39a1('bum): yid mi ches so// ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// skye mched drug skye mched drug gis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// reg pa
39a2('bum): reg pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tsher batsher bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi chas so// sred pa sred pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// len pa len pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi
39a3('bum): ches so// srid pa srid pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// skye ba skye bas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rga shi rga shis stong zhes bya bar yid ma chis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
39a4('bum): byin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bzod pa'i pha rol
39a5('bum): tu phyin po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan gyi
39a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// nang stong
39a7('bum): pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi
39b1('bum): rjes so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// don dam pa stong pa
39b2('bum): nying don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas
39b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis sdong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// mtha' las 'das pa spong ba nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid michis so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba
39b4('bum): nyid thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya drar yid mi ches so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rang
39b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyis snong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid sde ches so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rang gi
39b6('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis steng zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dngos
39b7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po
40a1('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dran pa che bar gzhag pa bzhi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// yang dag
40a2('bum): par spong ba bzhi yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dbang po lnga dbang
40a3('bum): po rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid sri ches so// stobs lnga stobs rnams kyis stang zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong zhes bya
40a4('bum): par yid mi ches so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa
40a5('bum): rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// bsam gtan rnams bsam gtan rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// tshad med pa rnams tshad med pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid
40a6('bum): mchis so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams par thar pa
40a7('bum): brgyad kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgus stong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// rnam par
40b1('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mngon
40b2('bum): par shes pa rnams mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// ding nge 'dzin rnams ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams
40b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis snong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcud bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// mi 'jigs par zhi mi 'jigs pa brjing
40b4('bum): stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chas so// snying rje chen po snying rje chen pos stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// sangs
40b5('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis sdong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid ma chis so// /
40b6('bum): lan cig phyir bong ba'i 'bras bu lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// dgra bcom pa nyid dgra
40b7('bum): bcom pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// rang byang chub rang byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so//
41a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis spong zhes bya bar yid mi ches so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ ji ltar gnas pa ma yin nan/
41a2('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma
41a3('bum): yin bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
41a4('bum): la gnas pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin
41a5('bum): 'dus na byas stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/
41a6('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos
41a7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ dran
41b1('bum): ba gagag rnams la banas pas yin/ yang dag par yod pa rnams la gnas nga ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas pas yin / dadang po rnams la gnas pas smin/ ljongs rnam
41b2('bum): gnas pa ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas pas yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ bsam gangan rnams
41b3('bum): la gnas pa ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ rnams par thar pa brgyad la gnas pa ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas da'i/
41b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la gnas pa ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la gnas pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin/
41b5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas pa ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/
41b6('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas pa ma yin/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ snying rje chen po la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas pa ma yin no//
41b7('bum): de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par chen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bdu shes la mngon par zhen pa yin / 'du byed la
42a1('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba la mngon par len pa yin/ sA la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce la
42a2('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro la
42a3('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig gi rnam par shes
42a4('bum): nga'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sgra'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i khams la
42a5('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ dri'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lce'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ro'i khams la mngon par zhen
42a6('bum): pa yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg bya'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la/
42a7('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos kyi khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags la mngon
42b1('bum): par zhen pa yin/ zhe sdang la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ma rig pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'du byed la mngon par
42b2('bum): zhen pa yin/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye mched drug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ reg pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba la mngon
42b3('bum): par zhen pa yin/ sred pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ len pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ srid pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ skye ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rga shi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sbyin pa'i
42b4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
42b5('bum): mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid
42b6('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ don dram pa stong pa nyid la
42b7('bum): mngon par men pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la mngon par len pa yin/
43a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ chos
43a2('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la mngon par nad
43a3('bum): pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ yang dag par spong ba
43a4('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dbang po rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ stobs rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag
43a5('bum): rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la mngon par zhen pa
43a6('bum): yin/ tshad med pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas
43a7('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams la mngon
43b1('bum): par zhen pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa ban
43b2('bum): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mngon par len pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
43b3('bum): pa bcwo brgyad la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen
43b4('bum): ba yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon/
43b5('bum): par len pa yin/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang
43b6('bum): rlabasams dpa' sems dpa' rjen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la mi slob nga / rnam pa thams ca sa byon pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan padas kyis paka' stsal pa/ shAr
43b7('bum): 'i bri lngar thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang bachen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob po yin / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa bcom
44a1('bum): ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags
44a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen
44a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brtags shing mngon par zhen
44a4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ phyi stong pa
44a5('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon
44a6('bum): par zhen/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mtha'
44a7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
44b1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa'id la brnabs shing bangon par ben/ chos thams cad stong panyid la brtags shing mngon par byen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing ngon par den/ mi mig
44b2('bum): stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid spong pa
44b3('bum): nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar gzhags pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la
44b4('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams la brlags shing mngon par zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhan/
44b5('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen / bamags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par ben / rlud
44b6('bum): med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
44b7('bum): snyom par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mngon par shes pa rnams
45a1('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ de bzhin gshegs
45a2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ so so yang dgra par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ snying rje chen pa la brtags/
45a3('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la brtags
45a4('bum): shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rishes rab kyi pha rol
45a5('bum): tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
45a6('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/
45a7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwar
45b1('bum): dating ba bung chu ba sems dpa' sems dang 'artson po shes rab kyi ma rol tu phyin pa la de lta slob na/ rnam pa thams kyang mkhyen pa du seMrnam gsu pa'i nas kyis 'byung ba ste'o// 'a
45b2('bum): su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de pasam gtan gyi rol du na pa la spyor pa'i tshe/ byasas gtan gyi rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag pa rjes sum subyung rje/ nga /
45b3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar thobo pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // ther dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
45b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi'i khrol phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
45b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
45b6('bum): ngo bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dri ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi 'ol
45b7('bum): tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
46a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
46a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
46a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
46a4('bum): ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba bam po bzhi bcu pa/
46a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa tI'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
46a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
46a7('bum): phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
46b1('bum): de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sesas dpa' chen po drin sdod pa nyid la spyod pa'i rgyu/ drin
46b2('bum): stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'o
46b3('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
46b4('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de lhur slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
46b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la spyod sde'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
46b6('bum): mthong ste/ shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sobo pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mthun pa 'id du 'byung ngo //
46b7('bum): thar dra nga'i byang chub sems dpa ba sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong panyid la spyong ba'ichi don dam pa stong panying de mi migs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwar dra ta'o du bya
47a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
47a2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rA shA ra dwa ti'i
47a3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
47a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
47a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
47a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems/
47a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
47b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po thog sa dang tha ma sbed pa stong banyid la spyod pa'i tshe thog pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shAr nga ti'i bu bung chub sa
47b2('bum): dba' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la du ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpar
47b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
47b4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang
47b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lang
47b6('bum): ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos
47b7('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmig na
48a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dro rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid
48a2('bum): stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
48a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
48a4('bum): su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
48a5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
48a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
48a7('bum): dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pog
48b1('bum): rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slo pa ni/ spyir mibyas pa'i tshus kyis rnas pa thams cad na ra du 'byung // shar dwati'i du byung chub sams dpa' sem sa dpa na dus su
48b2('bum): ngo ba nyid stong panyid la spyod pa'i dngos po med pa'i ngo borjod stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ 'dri rje'i bu byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa rten do shes pa
48b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran panye bar gzhag pa
48b4('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag ma dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
48b5('bum): ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/
48b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
48b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de
49a1('bum): dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/
49a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi dmigs/
49a3('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
49a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe stobs de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwa ra dwa
49a5('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu
49a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
49a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
49b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po baphags pa'i lam yan lag bcang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa las yan lag brgyad bya de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
49b2('bum): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
49b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dgra par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shAr
49b4('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shwa ra dwa ti'i
49b5('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i cha/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems/
49b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs nga'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shU ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
49b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spong ba'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shIr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa/
50a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA rA dwa ti'i bya byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/
50a2('bum): chen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
50a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
50a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
50a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems drang 'a chen/
50a6('bum): po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
50a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
50b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
50b2('bum): ba dang / smon pa med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ rdzi
50b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshwa/ mngon par shes pa de
50b4('bum): dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
50b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod po'i tshe/ ting nge 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
50b6('bum): su mi mthong ste shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpab sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de lngar slob pa ni/ mi dmigos pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung /
50b7('bum): shwar da ti'i bu byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po gsungs kyi sa rnams la spyod pa'i ma gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste / shwar dra ba'i bu byang chub
51a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
51a2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
51a3('bum): su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
51a4('bum): nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
51a5('bum): mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
51a6('bum): ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' semam dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
51a7('bum): su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
51b1('bum): 'byung ngo // shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i
51b2('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
51b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwa ra dwa ti bi du
51b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
51b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
51b6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi
51b7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
52a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
52a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
52a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab
52a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan
52a5('bum): bdas gang mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la ra// nang stong pa nyid mi dmig pa'i tshul dang / byi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong
52a6('bum): pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa
52a7('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmig pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs
52b1('bum): pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid
52b2('bum): stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / de bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
52b3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u
52b4('bum): drug pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dra zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes du
52b5('bum): 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom
52b6('bum): ldan 'das de 'ang du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri sring ci sgra ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol gyid pal bslabs shing / rnam
52b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dra ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
53a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing du
53a2('bum): 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la
53a3('bum): la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
53a4('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshul
53a5('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin// bcom
53a6('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa
53a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
53b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di nang stong pa nyid la bsrabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams ca sa khyen/
53b2('bum): pa nyid du thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi sdong pa
53b3('bum): ljid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das skad du 'dri bde la
53b4('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci snu mra'i skyes bu 'di byi nang stong po nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
53b5('bum): ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la le zhig 'di skad du
53b6('bum): 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
53b7('bum): mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di chen po stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /
54a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba
54a2('bum): de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
54a3('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
54a4('bum): skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus byas spong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
54a5('bum): 'gyur ram zhes mchin bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu mra'i skyes bu 'di 'dus ma byas stong
54a6('bum): pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad
54a7('bum): du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
54b1('bum): pa smra sa na/ ga
54b2('bum): ldan das la bzhi jig na thong ci zlu ma'i skyes bu'adi thug ma dang tha ma med pa slong 'a la bya ras shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nang ba chu sa
54b3('bum): mas na smram panyid byu gyur mchis gyon/ bcas ldan padas de 'dri ba yang gang du bstan pa nga/ bcom ldan das su spyo di nga nga
54b4('bum): shA / rnas pa sus nangs byung ba stsur sa mams skyes nga chu
54b5('bum): ngas gan / sa ldan dus sus na sa sa
54b6('bum): thams cad sa ma du byung bar lta sa/ rnam pa thamasas dus spyan cid ra shAr ram pas chenam pa ngas gang su tshu ba 'jig ldan pa

55a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du
55a2('bum): 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram
55a3('bum): zhes mchi na bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab
55a4('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rama?/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
55a5('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhog 'di skad du 'dri zhing nr-i sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
55a6('bum): rAmarnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad 'dri
55a7('bum): zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram nas
55b1('bum): mchin bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di gar du 'dri zhing ci sna ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po dnga'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs
55b2('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
55b3('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
55b4('bum): ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing
55b5('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslebs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/
55b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dra shing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa
55b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa cid du 'byung bar 'gyur ras/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skang du 'dri ba de la ji sang du bstan par bgyi
56a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dbang po rnams la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rama?/
56a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu
56a3('bum): ma'i skyes bu 'di stobs rnams la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtsho ni/ bcom
56a4('bum): ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs shing rnam pa
56a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
56a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam
56a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i
56b1('bum): skyes bu 'di ba lags pa'i den pa rnams la bsrabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ras pas mchin/ bcom ldan
56b2('bum): 'das de sang du 'dri ba de la ji sad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu mo'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
56b3('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la
56b4('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshad med pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram
56b5('bum): zhes mchin// bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci s+thu ra'i skyes bu 'di gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
56b6('bum): la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur rim zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de gang du 'dra ba de la
56b7('bum): ji gad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di sang du 'dri zhing ci smra ma'i skyes bu 'di rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
57a1('bum): ramarnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la
57a2('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
57a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dra zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rnam
57a4('bum): ngar thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
57a5('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mngon par shes
57a6('bum): pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba
57a7('bum): de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
57b1('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji gad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
57b2('bum): skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur sa
57b3('bum): zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di de bzhin gshegs bu'i stobs bcu la

58a1('bum): ldan 'das de sad du 'dri bde la ji skad du brtan par brdzi/ bcom ldan 'das la la khrig 'di skad du 'drizhi ba ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di snying rje chen po la bslabs shing /

64b4('bum): rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
64b5('bum): rdzu baphrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsil ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa gi rab byor
64b6('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ dbang po rnams kyang gshin la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mas/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
64b7('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
65a1('bum): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol ba
65a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang
65a3('bum): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems 'phags pa'i bden pa
65a4('bum): rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
65a5('bum): du semasabasam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
65a6('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lha ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
65a7('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/
