65b1('bum): de su 'gas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bu/ rab 'byor da jigam du sams// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang banan la/ sgyus yang gzhan cig yin rnam mas/ gsol
65b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sgoms par 'jug dgu yang gzhan la/ zlu ma yang gcan
65b3('bum): zhig yin thamams/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan grangs kyis bka' stsa lu pa/ rab byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par thar 'i sku stong pa'id
65b4('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan la/ s+thA ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das/
65b5('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan lu// sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin lham mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dase de lta
65b6('bum): ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol ba
65b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bko' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam
66a1('bum): ma ma gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems de bzhin gshegs
66a2('bum): ba'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lha ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
66a3('bum): de ji snyam du sems/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lha ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
66a4('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
66a5('bum): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ snying rje chen po yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom
66a6('bum): ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
66a7('bum): zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la/
66b1('bum): rdzus srung gzhanamig yin mamams/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thong zag brgyab bam po
66b2('bum): gtsug pa// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gnyen ma lags/ zlu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs cid kyang snus/ sgyus khyod kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan
66b3('bum): bangs tshor ba yang gnan sa lags/ mra yang gzhan sa lags te/ tshor banyid kyang smras/ sgyu ma chid kyang tsher ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dridi shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sa
66b4('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang ldu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du
66b5('bum): byed nyid kyang sgru pa/ sgyum nyid kyang 'du byed de// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgros yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang snu ma
66b6('bum): ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan sa lags/ snum yang gzhan ma lag sa te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go// bcom ldan
66b7('bum): zings rna ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sna yang gi 'an ma lags/ sbru ma yang gzhan
67a1('bum): mu lags te/ sna nyid kyang zlu ma sgra ma nyid kyang snga'o// bcom ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhanas lags te/ lce nyid kyang
67a2('bum): b+hU ma nA sgra sa nyid kyang lci'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan ma lags ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus nyid kyang snu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus so// bcom ldan
67a3('bum): 'dis yid kyang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
67a4('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgra yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
67a5('bum): smra nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sla'o// bcom ldan 'das dri yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan me lags te/ dri nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mo nyid kyang dri'o// bcom ldan 'das
67a6('bum): ro yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ro nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ro'o// bcom ldan 'das reg kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
67a7('bum): reg nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang reg/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so//
67b1('bum): saldan das rig rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags// zlum yang gzhan ma lags te/ skyes gi rnam par shes pa cing kyang rnas pa sgyum nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes dang /
67b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcos
67b3('bum): ldan 'das sna'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ snu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rtswa'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sngam/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan
67b4('bum): 'das lce'i rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lceb rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
67b5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sbrum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan
67b6('bum): 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom
67b7('bum): ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan
68a1('bum): 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//
68a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan
68a3('bum): 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das lus
68a4('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid
68a5('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
68a6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
68a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba nyid//
68b1('bum): dubyas du b+ha ga nga bdun pa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor bya'o/ bcom ldan 'das sgra'i 'dus te sa du'i byin gyis tshor ba yang gzhan sa la sa zlas yang ga na ma lags te/
68b2('bum): rtswa'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyus nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhanas
68b3('bum): legs/ rgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
68b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te rlig pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba yang gzhan ma legs/ sgra mra yang gzhan ma lagus te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi
68b5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
68b6('bum): tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan mi lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang
68b7('bum): b+h+ra ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mchid kyang chu'i khams so//
69a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang me'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das
69a2('bum): rlung gi khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan
69a3('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/
69a4('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
69a5('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/
69a6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes
69a7('bum): ngabo bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so// bcom/
69b1('bum): ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sde mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go// bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma
69b2('bum): lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang snum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das tsher ba yang gzhan ma legs/ sbrum yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba
69b3('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tsher ba'o// bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o// bcom
69b4('bum): ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o// bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
69b5('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
69b6('bum): kyang skye ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rga shi yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sbrum/ sgyu mchod kyang rga shi'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
69b7('bum): yang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyus/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu bya'o// bcom ldan 'das tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
70a1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
70a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
70a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha
70a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang
70a5('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa cid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
70a6('bum): kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang nang stong pa
70a7('bum): nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das phyi nang/
70b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sbru ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang sgyum sgyu ma nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang
70b2('bum): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chen po stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags
70b3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang sgyus/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
70b4('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'dus byas stong
70b5('bum): ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags tra/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
70b6('bum): kyang sbru ma sgyu ma nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mtha' las 'das pa
70b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
71a1('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog me dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
71a2('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mo nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
71a3('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
71a4('bum): lags te/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
71a5('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
71a6('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
71a7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/
71b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags
71b2('bum): sbrum yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid kyang smras/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i de bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams
71b3('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa che bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba
71b4('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi
71b5('bum): rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang ngo /
71b6('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan me lags/
71b7('bum): ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
72a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang ga 'a
72a2('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden/
72a3('bum): ba rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das bsam
72a4('bum): gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags de/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med pa rnams/
72a5('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
72a6('bum): rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so//
72a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mched kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// bcom
72b1('bum): ldan das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang zlum/ b+h+yAm
72b2('bum): nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sku stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sngon pa med pa yang gzhan ma las/
72b3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i zhi stong pa nyid dang /
72b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gcan mi lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ smram
72b5('bum): nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ ting nge 'dzin cing kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams
72b6('bum): so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan
72b7('bum): bdas de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams/
73a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnam so//
73a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan
73a3('bum): 'das snying rje chen po yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan
73a4('bum): ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang
73a5('bum): gzhan ma lags// sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lag te/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/
73a6('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir bong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ snu ma yang gzhan
73a7('bum): ma lags te/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra bcom pa
73b1('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyu mnyid kyang rang byang chub bo//
73b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu mnyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan
73b3('bum): 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
73b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
73b5('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
73b6('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/
73b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi
74a1('bum): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste
74a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
74a3('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems 'du shes dang / brda dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am
74a4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byung bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
74a5('bum): snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang /
74a6('bum): lus kyi lus med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / bgag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon
74a7('bum): mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
74b1('bum): 'di thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
74b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa
74b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bsrabs pa
74b4('bum): ltar bla na med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par du gyi'o// de ci'i mang du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de cid sgra ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi
74b5('bum): shaM b+haga'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsrabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
74b6('bum): tid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
74b7('bum): bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab
75a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa / bcom ldan 'dasu de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i
75a2('bum): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
75a3('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrubs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa
75a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// /
75a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
75a6('bum): du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lhor sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po
75a7('bum): ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
75b1('bum): bal bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di snga
75b2('bum): mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chur+m+ma
75b3('bum): lnga bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bra la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//
75b4('bum): slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das dri ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab stsal pa/
75b5('bum): rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol ba/ bcom
75b6('bum): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so//
75b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
76a1('bum): par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/
76a2('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lnga bu tshor ba ni rmi
76a3('bum): lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu// rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o//
76a4('bum): de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen
76a5('bum): po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
76a6('bum): mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin sdong
76a7('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
76b1('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs sos+ho// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs s+ho// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyum
76b2('bum): lta bu tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po TIg
76b3('bum): de dag ni rlung stong panyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs s+ho// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po
76b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
76b5('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
76b6('bum): phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos
76b7('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/
77a1('bum): tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po
77a2('bum): drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
77a3('bum): mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir
77a4('bum): mi dmigs so// mthub las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
77a5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
77a6('bum): dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni mig
77a7('bum): yor lta bu/ tsher ba ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po
77b1('bum): drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// byi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
77b2('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas
77b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
77b4('bum): dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa
77b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
77b6('bum): rab 'byor gzugs ni chu zla lta bu/ tsher ba ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni chu zla lta bu/ 'du byed ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po
77b7('bum): drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
78a1('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
78a2('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa
78a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
78a4('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa spyong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rdo drobar stong pa nyid kyi phyir sri migs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stod pa'i
78a5('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sdig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni sdig rgya lta bu/ 'du shes ni sdig rgyu rtsu bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sdig tu
78a6('bum): lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// byin /
78a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so
78b1('bum): dadus byas sbyong ba'i kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas sto pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mthab las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang thas da /
78b2('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
78b3('bum): so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi ngomigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
78b4('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sbrul pa lta bu/ tshor ba ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu/
78b5('bum): 'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sprul ba lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang ba drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mo dmigs so//
78b6('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa
78b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
79a1('bum): thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
79a2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa
79a3('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
79a4('bum): bdus de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang /
79a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs
79a6('bum): kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu yang ma 'ongs na 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
79a7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs mi sdang mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkab
79b1('bum): stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'id dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs kyi
79b2('bum): rdeg ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshe rab mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mo dmigs so// 'du shes mi rtag rjes bya bar rdog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed
79b3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon
79b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
79b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tsher ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so/
79b6('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/
79b7('bum): de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
80a1('bum): dpa' sems dpapa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag med ces bya bar
80a2('bum): rtog sde de mi dmigs so// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste de mi dmigs so// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed
80a3('bum): bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
80a4('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
80a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rdog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ dri mi dmigs so// 'du
80a6('bum): shes zhi zhes bya bar rtog sde/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed ni zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog sde/ de mi dmigs so/
80a7('bum): rab byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen
80b1('bum): nga shes rabyagyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs spong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
80b2('bum): dukhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i sems kyis tshor bsdong zhes bya bar rtog s+ho// de mi dmigs so// rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/
80b3('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rdzog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
80b4('bum): pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog sde/ da mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i
80b5('bum): b+hAbs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems
80b6('bum): kyis gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i sems kyis tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog sde/ de mi
80b7('bum): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid
81a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
81a2('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
81a3('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
81a4('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tsher rab smon pa med ces bya bar rtog
81a5('bum): ste de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
81a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/
81a7('bum): de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
81b1('bum): dbab chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rjod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ dri mi dmigs so//
81b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
81b3('bum): 'dra shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/
81b4('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub
81b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
81b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang
81b7('bum): ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi/
82a1('bum): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
82a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog sde/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
82a3('bum): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
82a4('bum): gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de// de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher rab mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ ra mi dmigs so//
82a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed/
82a6('bum): mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi
82a7('bum): dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpab
82b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de/
82b2('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
82b3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ dri mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed sdug bsngal
82b4('bum): ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed
82b5('bum): mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gcan yang byang chub sems
82b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/
82b7('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
83a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
83a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa bdag
83a3('bum): med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/
83a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs shi ba'i
83a5('bum): rnam par rtogs par byed / de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yong la byabs tshor bzhi pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ dri mi dmigs so// rnam pa
83a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
83a7('bum): bas 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed do//
83b1('bum): de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor ba na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang
83b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdong pa'i rnam par
83b3('bum): rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher rab stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
83b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes stong po'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
83b5('bum): meng la bya bas 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdong pa'i rnam
83b6('bum): par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs ma byas pa'o/
83b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
84a1('bum): gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bras tsher ba mtshan ma
84a2('bum): med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de
84a3('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
84a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de// de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
84a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabasu mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
84a6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
84a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du
84b1('bum): shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/
84b2('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
84b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
84b4('bum): ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
84b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs por byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
84b6('bum): bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rdzogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba
84b7('bum): med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs
85a1('bum): par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
85a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben pa'i
85a3('bum): rnam par rtogs par byeng dri/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam
85a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
85a5('bum): bsdu 'dra byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do// de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/
85a6('bum): dri mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa le spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// / shos rab
85a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya ba bam po zhi gnyis pa// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams
85b1('bum): cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs bdag med
85b2('bum): ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bldan to// gzugs ni zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
85b3('bum): chos bstan to// gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs ljon pa mad ces bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// dz+ra/
85b4('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tsherab mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
85b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tsher ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
85b6('bum): bstan to// tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tsher rab stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar
85b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
86a1('bum): chos bstan to// tsher ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
86a2('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de ma
86a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
86a4('bum): 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstun to//
86a5('bum): 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
86a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
86a7('bum): bstan to// 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed
86b1('bum): sngon bu med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed dben zhes
86b2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mi rtag dres bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya
86b3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa bdag medu ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi
86b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
86b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
86b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
86b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po demi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan
87a1('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs
87a2('bum): gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyon thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
87a3('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang ba dag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
87a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
87a5('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang sdong pa'i rnam par yud la byed pa dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
87a6('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
87a7('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya
87b1('bum): ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs grang mngon dbu 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa du mi migus pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yings du ba rmi
87b2('bum): ldan pas gzugs grang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyim yid labyed // nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang maldan pas tsher ba gang
87b3('bum): rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par mid
87b4('bum): la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ma ldan pas/ tsher bgrang bdag med pa'i rnam par yad la byed pa de mi dmigs
87b5('bum): ba'i tshul gyis yid la byed de// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshe dra ba gadra zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
87b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyen thos dang rlung sangs rgyas
87b7('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba/
88a1('bum): dang mi ldan pas tsher ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
88a2('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshe rab gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
88a3('bum): dang mi ldan pas tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang
88a4('bum): mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa'i
88a5('bum): yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs
88a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// /
88a7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
88b1('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
88b2('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byung ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
88b3('bum): ldan pas 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
88b4('bum): ldan pas 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du
88b5('bum): byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i
88b6('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de
88b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
89a1('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed grang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
89a2('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
89a3('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang
89a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
89a5('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
89a6('bum): dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas
89a7('bum): rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang
89b1('bum): bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la
89b2('bum): byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa du mi dmigs
89b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
89b4('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
89b5('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de/
89b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'di ni byang
89b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi
90a1('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag la mi
90a2('bum): rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam po drang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /
90a3('bum): smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
90a4('bum): po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jig sra mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
90a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
90a6('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu dzeg go/ rnam pa thams cad
90a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs
90b1('bum): ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go//
90b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
90b3('bum): yid la bya bas gzugs sngon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par du
90b4('bum): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben zhus bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
90b5('bum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
90b6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher ba
90b7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tsher bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
91a1('bum): rab tu rtog gro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa/
91a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
91a3('bum): bya bas tshor ba smon pA ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshur po mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
91a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tsher ba dben zhes par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa
91a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
91a6('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
91a7('bum): nga'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
91b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du
91b2('bum): shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
91b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
91b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas / 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
91b5('bum): 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bus 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
91b6('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
91b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
92a1('bum): / 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya
92a2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
92a3('bum): rdog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bras/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
92a4('bum): pa nyid da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas / 'du byed dben zhes bya bor de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas / rnam
92a5('bum): par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs po'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
92a6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
92a7('bum): gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
92b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
92b2('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'o yid la bya bas
92b3('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon
92b4('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi
92b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ de ltar de de dag lnga rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/
92b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi
92b7('bum): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
93a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
93a2('bum): la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
93a3('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing
93a4('bum): nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
93a5('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
93a6('bum): gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang byang chub
93a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs ni zhes bya bar de
93b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /
93b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshenam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzug so sbyong zhes
93b3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyaso dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed
93b4('bum): ba dang byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
93b5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
93b6('bum): ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshenam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
93b7('bum): la bya bas gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
94a1('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dbab chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam/
94a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
94a3('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
94a4('bum): ba'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ljon
94a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
94a6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs
94a7('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
94b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba lhag bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing
94b2('bum): mtho sa dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid lta bya ba dang / mau dge bde ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gnyen gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems das
94b3('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tsher ba bdag med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
94b4('bum): rdog ring nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgags su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang byang chub sems
94b5('bum): dbab sems dpa' rten po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsatshor ba'i zhes bya bar ri ma
94b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi rig pa de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgrogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyig mi 'byung ba dang /
94b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar
95a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bu dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
