95a2('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe da/ num rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga
95a3('bum): bya bas/ tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
95a4('bum): bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
95a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshe rab smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
95a6('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed po dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
95a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
95b1('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chu
95b2('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dben zhes bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rngog tsang can thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yad la
95b3('bum): bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
95b4('bum): tshi nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
95b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba da mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bregegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
95b6('bum): du zin pa la spyor pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing
95b7('bum): can thos dang rong sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgags su 'gyur ba gzhan gyig mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
96a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar
96a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog ci nga nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed
96a3('bum): pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshenam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas du
96a4('bum): shes ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge pa de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
96a5('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
96a6('bum): la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang
96a7('bum): chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
96b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
96b2('bum): dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam
96b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la byangs 'du shes smon pa med pa mod ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing phan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
96b4('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi'i 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
96b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
96b6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma dbyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa
96b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tsho/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
97a1('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba drang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyu ru ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
97a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
97a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang
97a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed sdug
97a5('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rong sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
97a6('bum): gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
97a7('bum): la bya bas 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
97b1('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
97b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge bde ma yin
97b3('bum): pabyang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhon gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod po'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
97b4('bum): ldan pa'i yod la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
97b5('bum): bgrags su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
97b6('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
97b7('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
98a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
98a2('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
98a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs
98a4('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
98a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang
98a6('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
98a7('bum): du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan
98b1('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
98b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'idu dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam por shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul
98b3('bum): gyis rdog cing tron thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang byang chub sems
98b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar
98b5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /
98b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes bzhi zhes
98b7('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed
99a1('bum): pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ga nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
99a2('bum): bas rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgrogs
99a3('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi gom 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
99a4('bum): la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
99a5('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid deng
99a6('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa ljon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba
99a7('bum): de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshonam rnam pa thams
99b1('bum): rung mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byad med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
99b2('bum): yid la byang dang mi dge bde ma yin du byang chub kyi baglegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi gom 'byed pa dang byang chub sem sa pa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la byed pa'i
99b3('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing can thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
99b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bregags su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
99b5('bum): phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
99b6('bum): rnon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid
99b7('bum): kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi tshor ba nyid kyang
100a1('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
100a2('bum): nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
100a3('bum): kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig
100a4('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba sdong pa ma yin gyi rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis
100a5('bum): sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'o//

100b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa spyod pa sa yin gyi/ mig gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rma'i rnam par shes pa'i

100b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis lha'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi lha'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pacid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa
101a1('bum): kyis sus rnam par shes pa stong pas yin gyi/ smras kyi rna ma par shes pa nyid kyang sod pabyed do// rjong ba hU~M byang sas rnam pa shes //
101a2('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stod pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes bsdod pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sbyong pa 'did// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa/
101a3('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi'i'adus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna
101a4('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o//

101b2('bum): ba'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba spyod pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi/

102a4('bum): stong pa rjid kyang sa'i khams so// chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu

102b1('bum): bar shes pa'i khams spong ba ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma

103a1('bum): \u0f7f/ pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa rjid kyang lenu pa'o// srid pa'i spyong pa nyid kyis med pa stong ba ma yin gyi/

103a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rga shi spong pa ma yin hU~M/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stod/

103b1('bum): byin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyi sna bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang thong panyid do//

103b7('bum): spong banyid kyis mar bsring pa nyid spong ba ma mimagyi chen po stong pa nyid kyang byung bzod do// spong panyid kyang chen pa snang pab ngo/ den dam paspong sa cid kyi spong batshad kyis
104a1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang song pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi

105a1('bum): nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//

106a1('bum): sdoms par 'jug pa nams so// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /

106a6('bum): kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid de
106a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
106b1('bum): pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/
106b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyi
106b3('bum): rje chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// /
106b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang
106b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
106b6('bum): po ni bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe gsum pa//
106b7('bum): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di/
107a1('bum): thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdung skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
107a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
107a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
107a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
107a5('bum): de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
107a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
107a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
107b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa ste/
107b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po 'i dge pa'i bshes
107b3('bum): gnyen ni gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mI dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
107b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
107b5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
107b6('bum): mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
107b7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
108a1('bum): gtogs par / nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs
108a2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
108a3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
108a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba bdag med ces
108a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
108a6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
108a7('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
108b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi
108b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad maldan pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo
108b3('bum): 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon
108b4('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi
108b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
108b6('bum): pa'o// gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyis
108b7('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
109a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya
109a2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs
109a3('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
109a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
109a5('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
109a6('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
109a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya
109b1('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas sar yongs su sbyor
109b2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mu gtogs
109b3('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la
109b4('bum): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sgoni cung dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
109b5('bum): bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
109b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
109b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
110a1('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams/
110a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang dri la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
110a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
110a4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cig/
110a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tsher ba
110a6('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
110a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
110b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
110b2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba tham ca kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
110b3('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma/
110b4('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi slar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
110b5('bum): gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
110b6('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
110b7('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
111a1('bum): gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
111a2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
111a3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par
111a4('bum): shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
111a5('bum): bram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben
111a6('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
111a7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
111b1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge gi
111b2('bum): rtsub thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed dben ces bya bar de mi
111b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
111b4('bum): 'jug papo// gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi gtogs
111b5('bum): bar/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i pashes gnyen du rig par bya'o//
111b6('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul chos ston cing dge ba'i
111b7('bum): rtsu ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sang ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya
112a1('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
112a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
112a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa ba ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
112a4('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ra yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mi
112a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
112a6('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
112a7('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sab ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de
112b1('bum): la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
112b2('bum): rgyas kyi ser yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
112b3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyis bam rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
112b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pagro// gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya
112b5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
112b6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
112b7('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
113a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
113a2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
113a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba bdag med
113a4('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
113a5('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
113a6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul chos ston cing
113a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus
113b1('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyi sa bam rang sangs
113b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
113b3('bum): banyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa tham rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dang tha sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
113b4('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mug ci zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
113b5('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
113b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
113b7('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
114a1('bum): gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan tho
114a2('bum): kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
114a3('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
114a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
114a5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen poni dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
114a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba stong
114a7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
114b1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'dug pa'o// gang de la ga sdong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paracan
114b2('bum): thos kyi se'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
114b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sra 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
114b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid stong zhes bya bar de mi
114b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
114b6('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
114b7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ming jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
115a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
115a2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mtshan ma med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
115a3('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
115a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus
115a5('bum): mtshan mi med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
115a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
115a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge/
115b1('bum): bzhi bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
115b2('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ldan cing / dge ba'i rtsa
115b3('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna ljon pa med ces bya bar de mi
115b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo
115b5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce ston pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / drage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
115b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
115b7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smon pa med
116a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma
116a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mngon par 'du
116a3('bum): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
116a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
116a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
116a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
116a7('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
116b1('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
116b2('bum): kyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'i/

116b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa tham rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge bo'i bshes gnyen ni
116b5('bum): gang de la mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bas
116b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
116b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
117a1('bum): kyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams ca kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogasmra paranyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
117a2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
117a3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
117a4('bum): pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid dben zhes
117a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
117a6('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
117a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
117b1('bum): su sngor ra 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog sa
117b2('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
117b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'i// gang de la ro mo rtag ces bya bar de
117b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor
117b5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
117b6('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
117b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
118a1('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge bzhi bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam
118a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
118a3('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang /
118a4('bum): de la dri sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am
118a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
118a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ba ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
118a7('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos sdug
118b1('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis bum rang sangs rgyas kyisar
118b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i pashes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
118b3('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma 'jug /
118b4('bum): gang de la sgra bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rung
118b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
118b6('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
118b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg bdag
119a1('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnartsub thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
119a2('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
119a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa ba ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/
119a4('bum): dge bzhi bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
119a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
119a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
119a7('bum): ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
119b1('bum): la ro lo zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
119b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la re gzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
119b3('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
119b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
119b5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
119b6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
119b7('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pago/
120a1('bum): gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing ma gtogs par nyan thos
120a2('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
120a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
