120a5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
120a6('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
120a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
120b1('bum): bya/ gang de la snyam tshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i bya bzlams rgyud kyang rnam pa thams cad ma gyun bzhin ma ga gas par
120b2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
120b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
120b4('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
120b5('bum): gang de la reg mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
120b6('bum): kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
120b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
121a1('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
121a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par// nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
121a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
121a4('bum): gang de la dri smon pa med ces bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang
121a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
121a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
121a7('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos smon
121b1('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis pas rang sangs rgyas kyi
121b2('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de/
121b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
121b4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
121b5('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
121b6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba
121b7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
122a1('bum): sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
122a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
122a3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
122a4('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi
122a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
122a6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
122a7('bum): kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// ga de la dri dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
122b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paracan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de 'a'o dben nyes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
122b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg dpan zhes bya bar
122b3('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
122b4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
122b5('bum): ba ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par
122b6('bum): shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
122b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi bajug pa'o// gang de 'arna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
123a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces
123a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
123a3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
123a4('bum): paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
123a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam
123a6('bum): par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
123a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa
123b1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
123b2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
123b3('bum): cadu dakhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paraganyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang nga la lha'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs
123b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug
123b5('bum): ba'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gnyis
123b6('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang nga la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon
123b7('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid
124a1('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa/
124a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi
124a3('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
124a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
124a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya
124a6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
124a7('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
124b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid sa gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// ba la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de ming rigs
124b2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'ang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o//
124b3('bum): gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
124b4('bum): can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su gror mi 'jug pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam gro zhi bzhi pa//
124b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
124b6('bum): kon cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// snang de la na
124b7('bum): ba'i rnam par shes pazhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
125a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
125a2('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa
125a3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
125a4('bum): yongs su stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
125a5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
125a6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
125a7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
125b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sgor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa
125b2('bum): sdong zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
125b3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
125b4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
125b5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi
125b6('bum): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
125b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
126a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
126a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
126a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i
126a4('bum): rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
126a5('bum): kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
126a6('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan
126a7('bum): ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
126b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
126b2('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa
126b3('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang
126b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa
126b5('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
126b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
126b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar nga mi
127a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sabs rang sangs rgyas
127a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
127a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes partson pa med ces bya bar
127a4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos
127a5('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'i// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa gron pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
127a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
127a7('bum): dge 'ab ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
127b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la na ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'dubya da
127b2('bum): ces bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi bar
127b3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
127b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya
127b5('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
127b6('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
127b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya
128a1('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
128a2('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam
128a3('bum): par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
128a4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
128a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de/
128a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
128a7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
128b1('bum): gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ros
128b2('bum): ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
128b3('bum): la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos
128b4('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
128b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
128b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus
128b7('bum): reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am
129a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / da
129a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa
129a3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
129a4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsub thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
129a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
129a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
129a7('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge bzhi bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
129b1('bum): kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
129b2('bum): de la na pa'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
129b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i
129b4('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su ster ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal
129b5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
129b6('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
129b7('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
130a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pasgod
130a2('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlos
130a3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
130a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
130a5('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
130a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de ma
130a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa/
130b1('bum): yang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi migs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa
130b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
130b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
130b4('bum): nub sems dpan sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ga gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
130b5('bum): thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gag pa/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
130b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa
130b7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
131a1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
131a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
131a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
131a4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
131a5('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i shes gnyen ni
131a6('bum): gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
131a7('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
131b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pastod zhes
131b2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
131b3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar ngo mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
131b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
131b5('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid su gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
131b6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
131b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po'i dge ba'i
132a1('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
132a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med
132a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
132a4('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
132a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de
132a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi se'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
132a7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
132b1('bum): darkyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
132b2('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
132b3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
132b4('bum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa
132b5('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgya kyi sar yongs
132b6('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
132b7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston//
133a1('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/
133a2('bum): gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
133a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
133a4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a5('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
133a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya bar
133a7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
133b1('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
133b2('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par / zan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
133b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
133b4('bum): gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
133b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yod kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston ci
133b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad maldan pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
133b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
134a1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i/
134a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang /
134a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams
134a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
134a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
134a6('bum): pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
134a7('bum): b.ranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
134b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
134b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
134b3('bum): chos sngon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// ga
134b4('bum): brna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
134b5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
134b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
134b7('bum): gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
135a1('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de
135a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
135a3('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
135a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rung sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
135a5('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
135a6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sra 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
135a7('bum): ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
135b1('bum): bas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lha'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon cing /
135b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams rgyud kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus
135b3('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
135b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
135b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
135b6('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
135b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la
136a1('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
136a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi
136a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa blam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
136a4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
136a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi
136a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
136a7('bum): ba'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
136b1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par / nyan thos kyis blam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
136b2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos sngon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su rtsor mi 'jug pa'o//
136b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
136b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sku 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
136b5('bum): la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
136b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
136b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus
137a1('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
137a2('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
137a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
137a4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
137a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
137a6('bum): ba'i bshes nyan ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
137a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes
137b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston rnying dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyis bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
137b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
137b3('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong
137b4('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
137b5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
137b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher
137b7('bum): ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
138a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi
138a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
138a3('bum): bar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
138a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
138a5('bum): gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
138a6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

138b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mu gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan
138b3('bum): mched ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mA gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
138b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem sad pa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi 'dus
138b5('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ljon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
138b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

139a1('bum): la gA'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bsngon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon rnying / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
139a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya/
139a3('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am dang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
139a4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
139a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ston pa
139a6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
139a7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon
139b1('bum): bar 'du bya ba ma ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rgyas kyis chom ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ga da thos kyis 'ang 'angs
139b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
139b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te
139b4('bum): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
139b5('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa lasabyung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
139b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
139b7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba/

140a2('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
140a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
140a4('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
140a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi
140a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
140a7('bum): gang de la pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
140b1('bum): bar/ nyan thos kyi sna'as rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te rag pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
140b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus
140b3('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
140b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
140b5('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
140b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe lnga pa// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
140b7('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
141a1('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
141a2('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
141a3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
141a4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
141a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'i
141a6('bum): gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
141a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
141b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsub thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel bar
141b2('bum): 'byung ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa gtogs paranyan thos kyi sabs rang
141b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
141b4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ga can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba
141b5('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
141b6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag
141b7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
142a1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
142a2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu
142a3('bum): phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
142a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
142a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces
142a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
142a7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
142b1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
142b2('bum): ba shes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
142b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
142b4('bum): de ni dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
142b5('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
142b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal
142b7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa bams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
143a1('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
143a2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
143a3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
143a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu/
143a5('bum): phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs braranyan thos kyi sa
143a6('bum): bum rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
143a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'as rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i
143b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid su gtogs par nyan thos
143b2('bum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson bgrus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de sa dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
143b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam
143b4('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
143b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
143b6('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
143b7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
144a1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
144a2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
144a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
144a4('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
144a5('bum): gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
144a6('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
144a7('bum): ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
144b1('bum): de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can
144b2('bum): zos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasasu sngor sri badrug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin
144b3('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa la
144b4('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
144b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya
144b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
144b7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
145a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa stong nas
145a2('bum): b+ha bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rngu ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad khyen pa'i du ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sbubs rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
145a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pastod zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
145a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis bram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
145a5('bum): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
145a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
145a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
145b1('bum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
145b2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos son cing
145b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan
145b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am
145b5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ramatshan ma med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
145b6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
145b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni / gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa med ces bya bar de mi rimigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
146a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
146a2('bum): phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
146a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
146a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med/
146a5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi
146a6('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyis pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
146a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa kham rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med
146b1('bum): ces bya ba de 'i dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs
146b2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya
146b3('bum): ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis tham rang sangs rgyas
146b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
146b5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
146b6('bum): bar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
146b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
147a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o//
147a2('bum): gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen bcing ma
147a3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
147a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
147a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
147a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam spangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
147a7('bum): byin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
