147b4('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
147b5('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
147b6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab
147b7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cig/
148a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
148a2('bum): gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rmos stom cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
148a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang sdong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
148a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
148a5('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
148a6('bum): gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
148a7('bum): bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
148b1('bum): pa rnams cad mkhyen pa cing ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
148b2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
148b3('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
148b4('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
148b5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi
148b6('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
148b7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
149a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
149a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
149a3('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
149a4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/
149a5('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi
149a6('bum): dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
149a7('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
149b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bonyid stong ba nyid mi rtag ces bya
149b2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sbu'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
149b3('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
149b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma matogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
149b5('bum): bzo bshes gcen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
149b6('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
149b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid
150a1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
150a2('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
150a3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
150a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
150a5('bum): gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
150a6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
150a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
150b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'as rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o/
150b2('bum): gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
150b3('bum): bar/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
150b4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba
150b5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
150b6('bum): bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
150b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de
151a1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
151a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
151a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
151a4('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug
151a5('bum): pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
151a6('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa po// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
151a7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sang ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
151b1('bum): yad ngos po meng pa'i ngob nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i
151b2('bum): ma gtogs par 'an thos kyis 'am nga sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dag 'brib shes
151b3('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
151b4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byi stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
151b5('bum): pa thams cad kyang rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gdogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gyi nang stong pa nyid bdag
151b6('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs
151b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
152a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid
152a2('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs

152a7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
152b1('bum): bcu bathams gyud kyang rnam pa thams cad su sbyin pa nyid ma gtogs ra nyan thos kyis bum rang sangs rgyas kyi ma yongs su thob mi 'jug pa'o// gang de 'jog ma da
152b2('bum): med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ na rjes
152b3('bum): kyi sa bar rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
152b4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med
152b5('bum): ces bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
152b6('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams kyang rnam pa thams cad
152b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
153a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
153a2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
153a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

153b1('bum): sems dbang chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la nang stong pa nyid kyi zhes bya bar de ming mig pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad brjed pa
153b2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i

153b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsub thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa/
153b5('bum): gang de la stong po nyid stong pa nyid ni nyes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thob kyi
153b6('bum): sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
153b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i/
154a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
154a2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
154a3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing

154a5('bum): stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
154a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa

154b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams/

155a2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

155a4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
155a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ glang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam

155a7('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma
155b1('bum): 'jug pa'o// glang de la byi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rgya ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtogs

156a7('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
156b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
156b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
156b3('bum): bla'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sdor
156b4('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
156b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa blam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
156b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor
156b7('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
157a1('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes
157a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
157a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya
157a4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
157a5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
157a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi srabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
157a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
157b1('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
157b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
157b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
157b4('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
157b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi srabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
157b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
157b7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
158a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma
158a2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
158a3('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
158a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar
158a5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
158a6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
158a7('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya ba che mi dmigs pa'i
158b1('bum): tshul gyis chos sngon cing dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mu gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
158b2('bum): pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mnyan
158b3('bum): bcid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
158b4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
158b5('bum): pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
158b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
158b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug po'o//
159a1('bum): gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
159a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
159a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni gang de la nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
159a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid smon pa med ces
159a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
159a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
159a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de

159b2('bum): su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
159b3('bum): mi gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
159b4('bum): ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
159b5('bum): gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par

160a2('bum): nyidu ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'as rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong pa nyid na pa med ces bya bar dmi

160a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis pas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// bang de la rang bzhim stong pa nyid ston pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

160a7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
160b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gyi sar yongs su gror mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de

161a1('bum): stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs

161b1('bum): dA bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas
161b2('bum): kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

161b4('bum): bar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
161b5('bum): 'am du sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
161b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma
161b7('bum): byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa/
162a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi

162a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par

162a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
162a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos
162b1('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stor cing dag pa'i rdzub thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
162b2('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

162b4('bum): gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
162b5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de ma
162b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
162b7('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
163a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po
163a2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
163a3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
163a4('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
163a5('bum): can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston dring dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
163a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi
163a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
163b1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes b+ha bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pacing ma gdogs/
163b2('bum): bar thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ming jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
163b3('bum): pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben
163b4('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams rud kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
163b5('bum): su sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
163b6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
163b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa
164a1('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
164a2('bum): thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge
164a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
164a4('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
164a5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
164a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
164a7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
164b1('bum): ba'o// gang de larang gi mtshan nyid stong banyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chos son cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thas sa cad mkhyen pa gco
164b2('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon cu
164b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa
164b4('bum): stong banyid dben zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs par/ can thob kyi sabs rang sa
164b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmims pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsub thams cad kyang rnam pa
164b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa shA ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya
164b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
165a1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar
165a2('bum): gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am
165a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
165a4('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
165a5('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
165a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
165a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar
165b1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
165b2('bum): su mor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
165b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyad kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
165b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
165b5('bum): rdor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
165b6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi
165b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spor
166a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
166a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
166a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
166a4('bum): gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
166a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
166a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnam
166a7('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
166b1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
166b2('bum): bcid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
166b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su gror mi 'jug pa'o//
166b4('bum): gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
166b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
166b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi la'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams
166b7('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
167a1('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bsgom pa'i blor de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
167a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
167a3('bum): phrag brgya pa bam po 'jug pa// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rdum pa thams
167a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug papo// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i/
167a5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thob kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
167a6('bum): de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa
167a7('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
167b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sbyong zhes bya bar de mi
167b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug
167b3('bum): ba'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
167b4('bum): b.racan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
167b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon
167b6('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
167b7('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
168a1('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par gnyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgos pa'i phyir de mi dmigs
168a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
168a3('bum): gang de la dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi
168a4('bum): sangam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
168a5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar de
168a6('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
168a7('bum): sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtor
168b1('bum): ba can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar des dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing da
168b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams
168b3('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang
168b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
168b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya
168b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
168b7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
169a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs
169a2('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
169a3('bum): ba'o// gang de la stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos
169a4('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
169a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
169a6('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
169a7('bum): gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang
169b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
169b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par gnyan thos kyi sa bas rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
169b3('bum): chos son cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paracan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs
169b4('bum): rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
169b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
169b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
169b7('bum): gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
170a1('bum): la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
170a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
170a3('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sab ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
170a4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
170a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
170a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya
170a7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
170b1('bum): su sgor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
170b2('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
170b3('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub
170b4('bum): kyi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang
170b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
170b6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de
170b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
171a1('bum): gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
171a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
171a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
171a4('bum): brgyad pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
171a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
171a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya
171a7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
171b1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
171b2('bum): ba cid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bram rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
171b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sra'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
171b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
171b5('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
171b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
171b7('bum): ba'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
172a1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi
172a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug
172a3('bum): ba'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
172a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags
172a5('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sangam/
172a6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de las pags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
172a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni zhes bya bar de mi dmis
172b1('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
172b2('bum): gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paraganyan thos kyis
172b3('bum): bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
172b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa med ces bya
172b5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
172b6('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
172b7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 5/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cho
173a1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
173a2('bum): pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
173a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams/
173a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams sdug bsngal zhes/
173a5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
173a6('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
173a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/
173b1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang del
173b2('bum): bsamag tan rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
173b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// glang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
173b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang dri la bsam gtan rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
173b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
173b6('bum): gang de la bsam gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
173b7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
174a1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams
174a2('bum): bsgom pa'i phyir re mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
174a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
174a4('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
174a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams
174a6('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas
174a7('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
174b1('bum): bcid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
174b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams
174b3('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
174b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
174b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
174b6('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
174b7('bum): gang de la tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
175a1('bum): sa lam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
175a2('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
175a3('bum): 'jug pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
175a4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba
175a5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms/
175a6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang

175b5('bum): ba rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang

177a1('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs/

177b3('bum): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
177b4('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
177b5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su spor mi 'jug pa'o//
177b6('bum): gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
177b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mngon par
178a1('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
178a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa dam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
178a3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis
178a4('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan
178a5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
178a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor ma
178a7('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
178b1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ka wAn thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong bcid dang
178b2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gtogs par
178b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmi
178b4('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug
178b5('bum): ba'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo sbyong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
178b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang
178b7('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ros ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
179a1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
179a2('bum): smon pa med bla med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
179a3('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
179a4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par
179a5('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
179a6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bsgom pa'i
179a7('bum): phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
179b1('bum): dang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i chul kyis chom ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid ma gtogs par na thos kyis pa
179b2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
179b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par ban thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshu byed
179b4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par
179b5('bum): shes pa rnams ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
179b6('bum): yongs su thor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams song zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing // dge pa'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
179b7('bum): bar nyan thos kyis sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
180a1('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
180a2('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
180a3('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i
180a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams dben
180a5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
180a6('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
180a7('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
180b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paranyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams/
180b2('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
180b3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
180b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paracan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
180b5('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin
180b6('bum): rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'as rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
180b7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
181a1('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
181a2('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
181a3('bum): gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
181a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
181a5('bum): rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
181a6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
181a7('bum): la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
181b1('bum): bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gsungs kyi sgo rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
181b2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams
181b3('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
181b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
181b5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sang ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
181b6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
181b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
182a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa bam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams smon pa med
182a2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
182a3('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
182a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sabam rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston/
182a5('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo
182a6('bum): rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ phan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
182a7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge bzhi bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mi rtag ces bya bar
182b1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su por mi
182b2('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
182b3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
182b4('bum): gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
182b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs paran
182b6('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
182b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
183a1('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
