296a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par
296a5('bum): shes pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
296a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmigs la/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
296a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgos ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de/
296b1('bum): ngag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
296b2('bum): med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang
296b3('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs
296b4('bum): ba'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
296b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ so so yang dag par rig pa
296b6('bum): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ byams pa chen po sgom ste/
296b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po de yang dmigs la/ byams pa chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
297a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snying rje chen po sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang dmigs la/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su
297a2('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs
297a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// / shes rab
297a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga gsum pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de ltar
297a5('bum): thabs mi mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sngang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa
297a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba
297a7('bum): lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med
297b1('bum): par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong ba mos pa med par byed bying /
297b2('bum): zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o//
297b3('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis
297b4('bum): 'di la bslab par bya ba ni mi che'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// bklag par mi bya'o// kun chub
297b5('bum): bar mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par
297b6('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang
297b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig
298a1('bum): bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol
298a2('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong
298a3('bum): ngo zhes bdud kyi las dag mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
298a4('bum): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis
298a5('bum): bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang /
298a6('bum): rtog pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ bya
298a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
298b1('bum): drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa/
298b2('bum): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byo
298b3('bum): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis sbyong ngo //
298b4('bum): rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
298b5('bum): gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gas bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
298b6('bum): chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
298b7('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus
299a1('bum): te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis skyong ngo // lce'i 'dus
299a2('bum): te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
299a3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo /
299a4('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni
299a5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // pa'i khams ni bdag gram bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams
299a6('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag
299a7('bum): gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ming dang gzug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis
299b1('bum): spong ngo // reg pa ni bdag gas bdag gis spong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stongango // sred pa ni bdag gas bdag gis sbyong ngo // len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sring ba ni
299b2('bum): bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis sbyong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi ba
299b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis skyong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan
299b4('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag
299b5('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
299b6('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha' las
299b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
300a1('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis
300a2('bum): stong ngo // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po/
300a3('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul/
300a4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag/
300a5('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni
300a6('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams
300a7('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
300b1('bum): ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis
300b2('bum): stongango // de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis slong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam
300b3('bum): bdag gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni bdag gam bdag gis spong ngo // sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ tha
300b4('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
300b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grog sa por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
300b6('bum): du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
300b7('bum): yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang
301a1('bum): stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med/
301a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med/ nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi sgra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
301a3('bum): ba'i grog por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad
301a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/
301a5('bum): byang chub sem dpa' sem+ba dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa'
301a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
301a7('bum): la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi
301b1('bum): yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshad med pa rnams la
301b2('bum): sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / srong
301b3('bum): ba nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhib/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyi sa mngon du gyis shig
301b4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
301b5('bum): grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du byen te/ 'di skad du bla na med
301b6('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal ba tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa
301b7('bum): tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras

313a1('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /

313a3('bum): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmig/

313a5('bum): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / snying rje chen po mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
